title: Get details of a popular hashtag

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Pass one of the advertiser IDs returned via advertiser_ids from /oauth2/access_token/ .

parameters.name: discovery_type
parameters.description: The type of discovery item. Currently, we only support HASHTAG .

parameters.name: hashtag_id
parameters.description: Hashtag ID. Pass in a hashtag ID that is returned via the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the hashtag you provide isn't included in the list returned by the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint, you will receive an empty list in response. Example: 4268426520694 .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Location code. Specify the same country_code as the one you input in the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the country_code you provide is not associated with the hashtag, we will return an error. See Location code for the supported values. Example: DE .

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: The timeframe in which the items have been popular. Specify the same date_range as the one you input in the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the date_range you provide is not associated with the hashtag, we will return an error. Enum values: 1DAY : last 1 day. 7DAY : last 7 days. 30DAY : last 30 days. 120DAY : last 120 days.
